findings.title: Unlocked Solidity Version
findings.description: It is a good practice to lock the solidity version for a live deployment (use 0.5.17 instead of ^0.5.17 ) to ensure contracts do not accidentally get deployed using a compiler with higher risks of undiscovered bugs.

findings.title: Redundant expression "this" in Context
findings.description: The 'this' keyword is used redundantly in a context.

findings.title: Literals with Too Many Digits
findings.description: PYRToken.slitherConstructorVariables() uses literals with too many digits, specifically totalTokensAmount = 50000000.

findings.title: PYRToken.decimals Should Be Constant
findings.description: The decimals variable of PYRToken contract should be declared as constant.

findings.title: PYRToken.name Should Be Constant

findings.title: PYRToken.symbol should be constant

findings.title: PYRToken.totalTokensAmount should be constant
